title: Dutch Couple On Trial Over Locking Foster Daughter, 10, In Electrified Cage
content: A couple went on trial on Thursday accused of locking their 10-year-old foster daughter in an electrified cage and throwing her downstairs, in a harrowing case that has shocked the Netherlands.
summary: A couple went on trial on Thursday accused of locking their 10-year-old foster daughter in an electrified cage and throwing her downstairs, in a harrowing case that has shocked the Netherlands.

title: "Wrath of God": 10 Points On Israel's Response To Munich Massacre
content: Today marks the anniversary of the 1972 Munich massacre, where eight members of Black September took 11 Israeli athletes hostage at the Olympics. Two were killed initially, and a failed rescue led to the deaths of all hostages, a German officer.
summary: Today marks the anniversary of the 1972 Munich massacre, where eight members of Black September took 11 Israeli athletes hostage at the Olympics. Two were killed initially, and a failed rescue led to the deaths of all hostages, a German officer.

title: Putin Says Constantly In Touch With India Over Ukraine Conflict: Report
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday named India among the three countries he is constantly in touch over the Ukraine conflict and said they are sincerely making efforts to resolve it, state-owned TASS news agency reported.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday named India among the three countries he is constantly in touch over the Ukraine conflict and said they are sincerely making efforts to resolve it, state-owned TASS news agency reported.

title: Musks X Bows To EU Data Protection Demands On Grok AI Scraping
content: Following the notification, X agreed to temporarily suspend the use of the data to train Grok - a commitment that became permanent on Wednesday
summary: Following the notification, X agreed to temporarily suspend the use of the data to train Grok - a commitment that became permanent on Wednesday

title: Woman Claims Kanye West 'Telegraphically' Told Her To Steal Car, Arrested
content: The woman, identified by police as 28-year-old Ricki Smith was arrested following reports of a disturbance.
summary: The woman, identified by police as 28-year-old Ricki Smith was arrested following reports of a disturbance.

title: Spacecraft Flies Closer To Mercury Than Planned After Thruster Problems
content: A spacecraft carrying European and Japanese probes passed closer to Mercury than originally planned overnight after thruster problems delayed the mission to study the little-known, Sun-scorched planet.
summary: A spacecraft carrying European and Japanese probes passed closer to Mercury than originally planned overnight after thruster problems delayed the mission to study the little-known, Sun-scorched planet.

title: Gunman Shot Dead Near Nazi-Era Exhibit, Israel Consulate In Germany
content: A gunman opened fire at German police before he was shot dead dead by officers Thursday near Munich's Nazi-era documentation centre and the Israeli consulate, the Bavarian state interior minister said.
summary: A gunman opened fire at German police before he was shot dead dead by officers Thursday near Munich's Nazi-era documentation centre and the Israeli consulate, the Bavarian state interior minister said.

title: Opinion: India Is Finally Reversing Its Semiconductor Misfortune
content: The Modi government has recognised the fact that if India needs to be a big geopolitical player, it needs to be the leading light in the semiconductor arena.
summary: The Modi government has recognised the fact that if India needs to be a big geopolitical player, it needs to be the leading light in the semiconductor arena.

title: Goldman Sachs Says Kamala Harris' Victory Better For US Economy
content: The investment bank stated the US economic growth would likely witness the biggest boost in the coming two years from a Democratic government, headed by Kamala Harris.
summary: The investment bank stated the US economic growth would likely witness the biggest boost in the coming two years from a Democratic government, headed by Kamala Harris.

title: Attacks On Hindus In Bangladesh Not Communal: Muhammad Yunus
content: Chief Adviser to Bangladesh's interim government, Muhammad Yunus, has said the issue of attacks on minority Hindus in his country is "exaggerated" and questioned the manner in which India projected it.
summary: Chief Adviser to Bangladesh's interim government, Muhammad Yunus, has said the issue of attacks on minority Hindus in his country is "exaggerated" and questioned the manner in which India projected it.

title: "Stay Silent In India Till...": Muhammad Yunus' Message To Sheikh Hasina
content: Muhammad Yunus, the head of Bangladesh's interim government, has said that former prime minister Sheikh Hasina making political remarks from India is an "unfriendly gesture", asserting that she must remain silent.
summary: Muhammad Yunus, the head of Bangladesh's interim government, has said that former prime minister Sheikh Hasina making political remarks from India is an "unfriendly gesture", asserting that she must remain silent.

title: China Pledges Another $51 Billion For Debt-Distressed Africa - A Debt Trap?
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping today pledged to step up China's support across the debt-distressed African continent with funding of nearly $51 billion, backing for more infrastructure initiatives and a promise to create at least 1 million jobs.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping today pledged to step up China's support across the debt-distressed African continent with funding of nearly $51 billion, backing for more infrastructure initiatives and a promise to create at least 1 million jobs.

title: Investor Who Risked It All On 'Black Myth: Wukong' Now Minting Millions
content: Black Myth: Wukong has sold 18 million copies in two weeks - one of the fastest starts the global gaming industry has seen. That record pace has in turn minted millions for its earliest and biggest investor.
summary: Black Myth: Wukong has sold 18 million copies in two weeks - one of the fastest starts the global gaming industry has seen. That record pace has in turn minted millions for its earliest and biggest investor.

title: US School Shooter Attempted To Enter Class, Was Denied Entry By Classmate
content: Colt Gray left the room at the start of the period but returned near the end, asking to be let back in, recounted a junior who sat next to Gray in class.
summary: Colt Gray left the room at the start of the period but returned near the end, asking to be let back in, recounted a junior who sat next to Gray in class.

title: India To Soon Top China Among Emerging Global Markets: Morgan Stanley
content: India is likely to soon overtake China as the most influential in a key emerging markets index, pulling in more foreign funds and adding fuel to a stock market rally that is "only past the halfway mark", Morgan Stanley said.
summary: India is likely to soon overtake China as the most influential in a key emerging markets index, pulling in more foreign funds and adding fuel to a stock market rally that is "only past the halfway mark", Morgan Stanley said.

title: Ugandan Olympian And Athlete Dies After Being Set On Fire By Ex-Boyfriend
content: Ugandan marathon runner Rebecca Cheptegei, who competed in the recent Paris Olympics, has died days after an ex-boyfriend threw petrol and set her ablaze.
summary: Ugandan marathon runner Rebecca Cheptegei, who competed in the recent Paris Olympics, has died days after an ex-boyfriend threw petrol and set her ablaze.

title: US Man Pays Over Rs 1.5 Lakh A Month In Rent To Live With 23 Roommates
content: A 33-year-old Sri Lankan native, who moved to New York from London in 2022, recently opened up about his living situation in Brooklyn's communal building, where he shares his home with more than two dozen people and pays a staggering $2,100 per month
summary: A 33-year-old Sri Lankan native, who moved to New York from London in 2022, recently opened up about his living situation in Brooklyn's communal building, where he shares his home with more than two dozen people and pays a staggering $2,100 per month

title: OpenAI Co-Founder Sutskever's New Safety-Focused AI Startup SSI Raises $1 billion
content: The Company currently has 10 employees and plans to use funds to acquire computing power and hire top talent. It will focus on building a small highly trusted team of researchers and engineers split between Palo Alto, California and Tel Aviv, Israe
summary: The Company currently has 10 employees and plans to use funds to acquire computing power and hire top talent. It will focus on building a small highly trusted team of researchers and engineers split between Palo Alto, California and Tel Aviv, Israe

title: Nvidia Did Not Receive A US Justice Department Subpoena, Spokesperson Says
content: Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday the Justice Department had sent a subpoena related to a potential antitrust investigation. The Justice Department did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
summary: Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday the Justice Department had sent a subpoena related to a potential antitrust investigation. The Justice Department did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

title: New Research Proves Cats To Be As Playful Companions As Dogs
content: Many people have seen dogs fetch, but cats like to get into the game too. Despite their very different hunting and play styles, fetching appears to combine elements of predatory and social behaviour for both species.
summary: Many people have seen dogs fetch, but cats like to get into the game too. Despite their very different hunting and play styles, fetching appears to combine elements of predatory and social behaviour for both species.
